languages.text: "Мой приказ — ждите. Я не собираюсь подыхать от рук ксеносов. Я одолею их и найду способ сбежать, после чего заберу вас с собой".

traits.locale_text: "Мой приказ — ждите. Я не собираюсь подыхать от рук ксеносов. Я одолею их и найду способ сбежать, после чего заберу вас с собой".

languages.text: "Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I shall return to take you with me."
languages.original_text: "Мой приказ — ждите. Я не собираюсь подыхать от рук ксеносов. Я одолею их и найду способ сбежать, после чего заберу вас с собой".

traits.locale_text: "Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I will return to retrieve you."
"Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I will return to retrieve you."
"Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I will return to retrieve you."
"Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I will return to retrieve you."
"Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I shall return to take you with me."
"Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I shall return to take you with me."

languages.text: 「命令はこうだ。待て。{mf|俺|私}は異種族の手で死ぬつもりはない。異種族を殲滅し、逃げる方法を見つけたら、必ずお前たちを連れに戻ってくる」
languages.original_text: "Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I shall return to take you with me."

traits.locale_text: 「命令はこうだ。待て。{mf|俺|私}は異種族の手で死ぬつもりはない。異種族を殲滅し、逃げる方法を見つけたら、必ずお前たちを連れに戻ってくる」

languages.text: “我给你们的命令是——老老实实等着。我还没打算死在那些异形手里。等我把他们全都干掉，想办法逃出来之后，我就回来把你们全都带走。”
languages.original_text: "Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I shall return to take you with me."

traits.locale_text: “我给你们的命令是——老老实实等着。我还没打算死在那些异形手里。等我把他们全都干掉，想办法逃出来之后，我就会回来找你们。”

languages.text: «Estas son sus órdenes: esperar. No tengo intención de morir a manos de los xenos. Una vez que los haya destruido y encontrado una forma de escapar, volveré a buscarles».
languages.original_text: "Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I shall return to take you with me."

traits.locale_text: «Estas son sus órdenes: esperar. No tengo intención de morir a manos de los xenos. Una vez que los haya destruido y encontrado una forma de escapar, volveré a buscarles».

languages.text: "Hier sind Eure Befehle: Wartet einfach. Ich habe nicht vor, durch die Hände der Xenos zu sterben. Sobald ich sie vernichtet habe und einen Fluchtweg gefunden habe, komme ich zurück, um Euch zu holen."
languages.original_text: "Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I shall return to take you with me."

traits.locale_text: "Hier sind Eure Befehle: Wartet einfach. Ich habe nicht vor, durch die Hände der Xenos zu sterben. Sobald ich sie vernichtet habe und entkommen, kehre ich zurück, um Euch zu holen."

languages.text: « Voici vos ordres : faites preuve de patience. Je n'ai pas l'intention de mourir de la main des xénos. Une fois que je les aurai détruits et que j'aurai trouvé un moyen de fuir cet endroit, je reviendrai vous chercher. »
languages.original_text: "Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I shall return to take you with me."

traits.locale_text: « Voici vos ordres : faites preuve de patience. Je n'ai pas l'intention de mourir de la main des xénos. Une fois que je les aurai détruits et que j'aurai trouvé un moyen de fuir cet endroit, je reviendrai vous chercher. »

languages.text: "Size emrim nettir: Bekleyin. Zenoların beni öldürmesine göz yummaya niyetim yok. Zenoları telef edip kaçmanın bir yolunu bulduktan sonra dönüp sizi de kurtaracağım."
languages.original_text: "Here are your orders: wait. I do not intend to die at the hands of xenos. Once I have destroyed them and found a way to escape, I shall return to take you with me."

traits.locale_text: "Size emrim nettir: Bekleyin. Zenoların beni öldürmesine göz yummaya niyetim yok. Zenoları telef edip kaçmanın bir yolunu bulduktan sonra dönüp sizi de kurtaracağım."
